tooltips.DownloadAllAttachments: Enable the Download All Attachments action.
tooltips.DownloadAllAttachmentsStream: Enable the Download All Attachments action for Stream Panel
tooltips.DownloadAllAttachmentsMode:
Single: Downloads each attachment one by one. 

Zip: Downloads a single archive with all the attachments. 

Dual: Makes both modes available at the same time.
